sentences.english: The Tourney of Talent is about to begin.
sentences.chinese: 星光燦爛的比賽馬上就要開始了。

sentences.english: God bless all, from Star Makar .
sentences.chinese: 上帝保佑一切，從星光馬卡。

sentences.english: Occasionally, the moon and a handful of stars shone through the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 透過那一片片雲，間或可以看到月亮和點點星光。

sentences.english: Stars shine brightest in the long dark night of winter.
sentences.chinese: 星光照耀得最亮的時候，是在黑暗的冬夜。

sentences.english: It was the gloomy star of the police which was rising in the sewer.
sentences.chinese: 這是保安警察的陰暗的星光在陰渠中升起了。

sentences.english: This is a star-spangled day, deserving of a gold star on your calendar.
sentences.chinese: 這是個星光燦爛的子，值得在歷上畫一個大金星。

sentences.english: And in the sky above, her starry backdrop.
sentences.chinese: 我看見了高空星光點綴的天幕。

sentences.english: That was one of the few verifiably "live" touches in an evening filled with starch and bromides.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣一個星光燦爛的夜晚，還是有一些現場尷尬。

sentences.english: Achieve at times a very star-like start.
sentences.chinese: 卻時常帶給人星光般的開始。

sentences.english: Capricornus is an ancient and venerated constellation.
sentences.chinese: 摩羯座的星光是比較微弱暗淡的。

sentences.english: It was made of tin and shone like a star.
sentences.chinese: 這朵花是由錫製成的，如星光一樣閃亮。

sentences.english: Starlight in the Mou light orders a point, body the very tiny Zhan Li write.
sentences.chinese: 眸光裏星光點點，身子微微的顫慄着。

sentences.english: And twinkle on the milky way.
sentences.chinese: 像銀河中閃爍的星光點點。

sentences.english: They share the limelight by telling stories about star performers.
sentences.chinese: 他們顛末過程報告明星表現者的故事來分享“星光”。

sentences.english: The name of Sailor Starlights in the Chinese versions are difficult, too.
sentences.chinese: 該版本在中國水手星光名是困難的，太。

sentences.english: Looking at the night sky, bright stars who don't admire infinite universe?
sentences.chinese: 遙望星光燦爛的夜空，誰不讚嘆宇宙的無窮？

definition: many stars/a vast sky full of stars
